trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brinsworth
There were no other sightings in Brinsworth on or around May 10th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was late go to bed, i got out at my back door to smoke my last cigarette, and I look't in the sky to the west and saw that flying star in very high altitude it diapered in a sec. up warts. it must be very fast. that is not the first time, last year so end off august I saw a round 15 to 20 and even my children saw them flying from any directions and then standing still for hours like stars i was very fascinated and excited to see that happens,my children had no explanation for that... I think we will see that soon often.
